This internship strengthened my technical skills (Python, specialized libraries, CI/CD) and improved my collaborative project organization abilities.

experience.title: Curriculum at 42
experience.summary: Immersive practice-based program covering systems, networking, algorithms, and web development.
experience.description: 42's pedagogy is entirely based on practice, autonomy, and peer evaluation: no classes, no teachers, only projects. This continuous rhythm taught me to work efficiently with complete autonomy, maintain clean code, and quickly progress on new technical topics. It provided me with solid foundations to specialize in any field of computer science.
